name: You&Food
description:
A small game by Pierpaolo Di Simone. I borrowed some stuff from Taito, Fukio Mitsujii, Samuele Sciacca&Manolo Saviantoni. Thank you!

This game is dedicated to MTJ (1960-2008).

Controls:
Move with arrows on your keyboard(<--    -->)
You can also touch screen (left/right in the lower part of the screen)
